item.description:
Join members of Connecticut-based Two Ravens Kindred, our family, friends, and other "good folk" as we celebrate Winter's end and the return of Spring. Gathering will be held at the East Hartford, Connecticut home of Mike and Alice.

SCHEDULE for Sunday, March 22
2:00pm - Doors open
4:00pm - Pre-blot discussion
5:00pm - Blot (ritual) in honor of Ostara
6:00pm - Husel (feasting)
7:00pm - Socializing and possible Sumbel (formal toasting)

RSVP for house address, contact info, and directions.

We'll provide non-alcoholic beverages, snacks, and a spiral ham for the feast. Attendees are requested to bring a side dish, dessert, or other food item to share. Please let us know what you plan to bring when you RSVP so we'll be able to fill in any gaps. BYOB.

This event is "open" to all who we've met in the past or those who are "vouched safe" by other members of the community. By my lady's request, if you're interested in attending but haven't been to any previous Meetups or heathen community events, then please email me so we may arrange to meet for a quick, public cup of coffee sometime between now and the event.

We hope to see you there!

Wassail,
Mike Hicks
Two Ravens Kindred member www.tworavenskindred.org
Connecticut Steward for The Troth www.thetroth.org
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP for actual street address & directions

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate Spring! Ostara Gathering with Two Ravens Kindred
